code: ls <- db |>   as_tibble_list()  for (i in 1:length(ls)) {   pander::pandoc.table(ls[[i]], split.table = Inf) } con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite())  db |>   as_rdb(con)  DBI::dbListTables(con) #> [1] "mrs_cause" "when"      "where"  DBI::dbDisconnect(con) sq <- star_query(db) |>   select_dimension(name = "where",                    attributes = "state") |>   select_dimension(name = "when",                    attributes = "year") |>   select_fact(name = "mrs_cause",               measures = "all_deaths") |>   filter_dimension(name = "when", year >= "1963") |>   filter_dimension(name = "where", city == "Bridgeport" | city == "Boston")  db_2 <- db |>   run_query(sq) ft <- db_2 |>   as_single_tibble_list() ft_cause <- ft[["mrs_cause"]]  pt <- pivottabler::qpvt(   ft_cause,   c("=", "state"),   c("year"),   c("Number of Deaths" = "sum(all_deaths)") )  pt$renderPivot() gl <- db_2 |>   as_geolayer()  l1 <- gl |>   get_layer() class(l1) #> [1] "sf"         "tbl_df"     "tbl"        "data.frame"  title <- gl |>   get_variable_description("var_1")  plot(sf::st_geometry(l1[, c("var_1")]), axes = TRUE, main = title) text(   sf::st_coordinates(sf::st_centroid(sf::st_geometry(l1))),   labels = paste0(l1$state, ": ", l1$var_1),   pos = 3,   cex = 1.5 ) l2 <- gl |>   get_layer(keep_all_variables_na = TRUE)  plot(sf::st_shift_longitude(l2[, "var_1"]), axes = TRUE, main = title) f <- gl |>   as_GeoPackage(dir = tempdir())  sf::st_layers(f) #> Driver: GPKG  #> Available layers: #>   layer_name geometry_type features fields crs_name #> 1   geolayer       Polygon        2      3   WGS 84 #> 2  variables            NA        2      3     <NA>

title: rolap 2.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-12-11 Geographic information query functions: as_geolayer(), get_layer(), get_variables(), set_variables(), as_GeoPackage(). Functions define geoattributes: define_geoattribute(), check_geoattribute_geometry(), get_geoattributes(), get_geoattribute_geometries(). Geographic information processing functions: coordinates_to_point(), get_layer_geometry(), summarize_layer(), get_point_geometry().

title: rolap 2.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-11-14 Functions query star database: star_query(), select_fact(), select_dimension(), filter_dimension() run_query(). Functions deploy star database one relational databases: deploy(), cancel_deployment(), get_deployment_names(), load_star_database(). New functions: get_star_database(), as_rdb(), draw_tables(). Vignette star database deployment process. Vignette star database export features. Vignette multidimensional queries. Include new items README file. US census flat table dataset. Fix snake_case() register refresh operation constellation case. Fix constellation() refresh structure integration.

title: rolap 2.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-16 Change star database list parameter constellation() function. Fix replace_empty_values() spaces beginning end non-empty strings. Star databases data incremental refresh functionality: update_according_to(), get_transformation_code(), get_new_dimension_instances() incremental_refresh() among functions. Vignette star databases incremental refresh. Fix new problem building macos-latest (release) input functions file database vignettes.

title: rolap 2.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-15 Vignette obtaining transforming flat tables. Definition flat_table class functions transform integrate data. Vignette integration dimension instances. Functions query modify instances dimensions. Definition common data model star databases constellations. Vignette md rolap packages.

title: rolap 2.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-08-13 Definition role-playing role dimensions (explanatory vignette): role_playing_dimension() get_role_playing_dimension_names() functions. New functions query rename attributes dimensions measures facts: get_attribute_names(), set_attribute_names(), get_measure_names() set_measure_names(). Include detailed validation error messages.

title: rolap 2.0.0
